channel.title: Dodian source
channel.description:
Hello, i have a dodian source from May , just how it was, before jagex took it out.
Only problem is, i do not know how to use it.
You see it has . Modcp and loginserver.
And ofcourse the source.
How do i combine them? What i need to do to get it working ?

item.title: Dodian source
item.dc:creator: @ratekas999 ratekas999
item.description:
@ratekas999 wrote:

No its not just that easy.

To connect to that server. You need to combine modcp and login server. Any clues?

And its not buggy. Its the same it was.

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian source
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

“a Dodian source”

That is the old server where the home was Yanille correct? That source is very old and probably buggy, I wouldn’t use it.

Of course you probably just need to run the batch file if it has one, if it doesn’t just make one.

echo off java Server.java pause

or wherever the main method is.

Read full topic
